statements: DELETE FROM Volunteer WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Volunteer WHERE id = 1 AND phone_number = '+1234567890';
DELETE FROM Volunteer WHERE address LIKE 'Oak Street%' AND email = 'example@email.com';
DELETE FROM assignment WHERE volunteer_id = 100 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE volunteer_id = 101 AND date = '2022-01-12';
DELETE FROM assignment WHERE status = 'pending' AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND start_time = '09:00:00';
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE date = '2022-05-15' AND location = 'Community Center';
